title: siddhAntam iduvE
sahitya:
siddhAntam iduvE ulagamellAm shivamayam enbaduvE


anupallavi

  attan en ANDavan Ananda naTarAjan aDiyArgaL anbinAl anubhavittOdiya


caraNam    karumbilum kaniyilum nirambiya rasam pOlE kaNgaLukk-oLi kATTum 
viNmaNi shuDar pOlE arumbinuL maNam pOlE virumbum uyirukkuyirAi 
angangE adaduvAit-tAngi aruL puriyum mangaLa jyOtiyir-pongiya jnAnamAm
